music.examples:
React with:
⏯ to pause and resume
⏹ to clear the queue
⏮ to skip back to the previous song
⏭ to skip
🔀 to shuffle the queue
🔁 to repeat the queue
🔂 to hear the song in continuous loop
🔎 to search for song (spotify, youtube)
🔉 to turn down the volume
🔊 to turn up the volume
<:spotify:690172298346496116> to sync your spotify account and hear it in discord with your friends
music.nopermission: I need the permissions to join and speak in your voice channel
music.novoicechannel: You need to be in a voice channel to play music!
